lead_paragraph: In her years of conducting soccer clinics, Yael Averbuch writes, one thing has become clear: There is a need for standards of development at various age levels.
snippet: In her years of conducting soccer clinics, Yael Averbuch writes, one thing has become clear: There is a need for standards of development at various age levels.

headline.main: Holding Soccer Drive and Devotion to a Certain Standard
